Rich natural chikoo ice cream with real chikoo pieces (contains milk).

Additional Info 1: Tender coconut ice cream with fresh tender coconut pieces (contains milk).

Item Name: Fresh Fruit Very Berry Strawberry Ice Cream
Additional Info 1: Sublime strawberry ice cream with real strawberry pieces. This strawberry ice cream is a childhood favourite. Scrap that actually, its an all time favourite! (contains milk).
Litchi ice cream with fresh litchi pieces makes for a lush, delicious treat! (contains milk).
Indulge in a delectable experience of rich fig ice cream loaded with sumptuous fig pieces (contains milk).

Ice cream with real banana and strawberries with strawberry ribbon. This banana and strawberry ice cream combination has stood the test of time. You simply cannot go wrong with this delicious ice cream.
Luscious guava ice cream dressed in fresh guava bits & churned in creamy milk (contains milk).
Black currant ice cream with real black currant and raisins. This flavoured sweet treat is a universal favourite.
Orange flavoured ice cream adorned with exotic fruit chunks and jelly. This fruity delight is truly delicious! Get a load of this fruit overload ice cream.

Item Name: D'Lite Very Berry Strawberry Ice cream

Additional Info 1: Vanilla ice cream swirled with butterscotch ribbon. This thick, sinful butterscotch ribbon will leave you going back for seconds.
Delectable kesar & cardamom flavored ice cream with cashews & pistachios (contains milk & tree nuts (cashew & pistachio).

Vanilla ice cream with caramel ribbon and almond praline. We have put together two classics flavours with a caramel ribbon stitching them together. This almond praline gold proves that sometime old is truly gold! (contains milk & tree nuts).

Ice cream with rich caramel and honey praline almonds. Honey, its nutty, its crunchy and its delightful. What are you waiting for? Get yourself a load of this honey nut crunch ice cream. (contains milk & tree nuts).

With a butterscotch base, this ice cream has cashew crunch along with an enticing butterscotch ribbon. Stop drooling, start clicking! Our butterscotch ice cream is calling out to you! (contains milk & tree nuts).

A vanilla base decorated with praline coated pecans and a delicate caramel ribbon. This creamy cool ice cream dotted with praline pecans has just the right amount of crunch and sweetness with a swirled in caramel ribbon.
Praline coated almonds peeping out of dark chocolate ice cream (contains milk & tree nuts (almond).
Tempting chocolate ice cream with a distinct hint of cocoa. The mother of every chocolate ice cream creation of ours.

A heavenly combination of chocolate and vanilla married together with chocolate chips and ribbon. A feisty ribbon twirling its way through this chocolate chip loaded chocolate and vanilla ice cream scoop. This ice cream is as enticing as they come!(contains milk & soy).

A heavenly medley of vanilla and chocolate, embraced by a caramel ribbon. This vanilla and chocolate combo is our dream team! A thick, deep caramel ribbon intertwines the two flavours together in perfection.
Delectable chocolate fudge and ice cream, married by a fudge ribbon and sprinkled with brownie pieces. We have tripled up on chocolate with this mississippi mud flavour! Chocolate overload anyone.

Rich chocolate based ice cream adorned with chocolate pieces and cashew nut crispies. If it's bavarian chocolate flavour then its gotta be sinful and intensely indulgent. Throw in a bit of crunch and you have got a truly divine chocolate ice cream treat.

Rich chocolate ice cream with hidden treasures of dark chocolate cookies, hugged by a caramel ribbon. This delectable chocolate delight is like no other! Sit back and enjoy this rich belgian bliss ice cream.

Item Name: Choco Chip Mousse Royale Ice Cream
Additional Info 1: Mischievous chocolate chips playing peekaboo with frozen chocolate mousse dessert. There no such thing as too much chocolate is there? How about you triple up on this cool chocolate chip mousse ice cream with a chocolate waffle cone.
A unique union of malt flavoured ice cream and chocolate chips blessed by a chocolate ribbon. Surprise yourself with this malted chocolate fudge delight, its a one of a kind! (contains milk & soy).

Item Name: Mint Milk Chocolate Chips Ice Cream
Additional Info 1: An ice cream that tells the mint and chocolate love story like no other. This classic ice cream is a marriage of mint and milk chocolate pieces.
Not quite like a plain jane, this is a rich, dense vanilla ice cream that you'll recommend to friends. Seriously creamy, seriously tasty, a lot can happen over a vanilla ice cream! (contains milk).

Celestial ice cream with a dark blue raspberry and light blueberry embrace. This delectable blue raspberry and blueberry ice cream scoop with leave you feeling blue. The right kind of blue! (contains milk).
Perky pink, purple and childhood coloured cotton candy flavoured ice cream. We are happy to let you know that we have fulfilled every childs wish of cotton candy ice cream.
Luscious ice cream with freshly ground coffee. This cool coffee flavoured ice cream will delight all coffee lovers out there! (contains milk).
Brs favourite vanilla ice cream churned with thick vanilla milk.
Farm fresh strawberries whisked together with vanilla ice cream, a smooth dollop of whipped cream topped with strawberry bits.
Crunchy butterscotch ice cream churned with thick vanilla milk.
Classic cold coffee made with brs signature vanilla ice cream.
Timeless combination of vanilla ice cream and cookies churned together with milk and topped with cream, chocolate syrup and oreo crumbs.
Decadent dutch chocolate ice cream, blended together with milk and topped with cream and chocolate syrup .

Chocolate Truffle Ice Cream Cake  (500 Gms)
Additional Info 1: This ice cream cake is a celebration of chocolate. It consists of chocolate sponge cake, with chocolate shavings on top. And a whole of lot chocolate ice cream inside, thus making it every chocolate lovers dream.
This pineapple ice cream cake promises to make your mouth water. A whole lot of Pineapple, whipped cream, sponge cake and Pineapple on top. Oh, did we mention its got pineapple.

Item Name: Black Forest Ice Cream Cake  (500 Gms)
Additional Info 1: Looking for a cake? Looking for ice cream? Look no further than this classic Black Forest ice cream cake. Layers of chocolate sponge cake alternated with thick whipped cream. A cherry on top to make the Black Forest cake all the more unforgettable!

Item Name: Blueberry Cheesecake Ice Cream Cake (500 Gms)
Red Velvet Fantasy Ice Cream Cake(500 Gms)
Classic Fudge Ice Cream Roll Cake
Additional Info 1: This ice cream roll cake is a classic combination of vanilla ice cream wrapped in chocolate sponge & covered with chocolate fudge and almonds.

Item Name: Bavarian Knight Ice Cream Roll Cake
Additional Info 1: Bavarian chocolate ice cream wrapped in chocolate sponge & covered with chocolate fudge and almonds. Chocolate, chocolate and then some more chocolate. This ice cream roll cake sounds perfect, doesnt it?

Item Name: Mississippi Mud Ice Cream Roll Cake
Additional Info 1: Mississippi mud ice cream wrapped in brownie chocolate cake & chocolate truffle, drizzled with chocolate confectionery & pecan pralines. A luxurious chocolate delight all swirled into one cake make a sinful chocolate ice cream roll cake.

Item Name: Red Velvet Ice Cream Roll Cake
Additional Info 1: Red velvet ice cream wrapped in red velvet marble cake & white chocolate truffle, drizzled with red velvet and white chocolate confectionery. This white chocolate and red velvet ice cream roll cake will have you dreaming of christmas!
